items.content_html: CurlDock: A lightweight, developer-friendly tool for API testing and curl script management. Built with Rust and React, it simplifies the creation, execution, and organization of curl commands through a user-friendly interface. Designed for local development environments, CurlDock emphasizes simplicity and integration with existing workflows.
